name: Release Your Anger (V)
Text: 'Destiny +2 when drawn for weapon or lightsaber combat destiny.USED: Take Your Powers Are Weak, Old Man into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.LOST: If you just lost a character armed with a non-[Permanent Weapon] lightsaber, lose 1 Force to take that character (or lightsaber) into hand.(Original concept by Nate Meeker - Coruscant Regionals 2006)',
